name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Moonlit Isles (II)
achievementGroupName: Nod-Krai: An Elysium of Moonlight and Wanderings (II)

stage1.title: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Moonlit Isles (II)
stage1.description: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following areas in Nod-Krai: Voidsea Outlook, Wavechaser Plain, and Ashveil Peak.
